biography: Joe Ma is a Hong Kong actor. He was a policeman before he joined the Hong Kong entertainment industry in 1993. He is one of few Hong Kong actors who were former members of Hong Kong discipline or colonial services. Ma is most known for his extensive career with broadcaster TVB, particularly for the dramas "Journey to the West" (1996), "Triumph in the Skies" (2003), and "The Drive of Life" (2007).
name: Joe Ma
